definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
unity is strength (revolutionary slogan and popular song of 1943)
pinyin: tuan2 jie2 jiu4 shi4 li4 liang5
da3 ji1 jun1 shi4 li4 liang5

sentences.english: Engage your core muscles, then curl your upper body towards a sitting position.
sentences.chinese: 調動人體核心部位的肌肉力量向上擡體，成坐姿。

sentences.english: Keeping our military and using them when we have to, but not as our first instrument.
sentences.chinese: 保存軍事力量，不到非不得已絕不輕易動武。

sentences.english: Thiscreature has two powers that involve burrowing.
sentences.chinese: 這個生物有兩種力量可以輔助鑽地。

sentences.english: Placebos work, doctors believed, because the mind is a powerful thing.
sentences.chinese: 醫生們相信安慰劑起作用，是因爲念力是一種力量。

sentences.english: Local rulers were too weak to extirpate them.
sentences.chinese: 當地的統治者力量太弱，無法根除他們。

sentences.english: And then there is China, which has the greatest potential to undermine the Asia-Pacific peace.
sentences.chinese: 還有就是中國，他是本地區巨大的潛在力量。

sentences.english: Let me begin with the negotiations on the intermediate-range nuclear forces that are currently under way in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 讓我先談談正在日內瓦進行的關於中程核力量的談判。

sentences.english: The Way of the Dragon God believes that the heart, more than anything else, points the way forward.
sentences.chinese: 龍神道相信指引方向的最大力量莫過於心。

sentences.english: We have the power and ability to overcome any obstacle in our path.
sentences.chinese: 我們有力量和能力去克服路途上的一切障礙。

sentences.english: Yang is the muscling principle in nature and Yin is the opposite.
sentences.chinese: 陰和陽是貫通整個世界的兩個相對立的力量。

sentences.english: The additional troops quickly divided the North Korean forces, which had been stretched from north to south.
sentences.chinese: 增援部隊迅速分，被拉長了，從南到北朝鮮的力量。

sentences.english: Which needs the support from all circles of society.
sentences.chinese: 新母城的建設需要聚合全社會多方面的力量。

sentences.english: Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger was fully aware of the power of youth culture.
sentences.chinese: 時裝設計師湯米海肥哥完全意識到年輕文化的力量。

sentences.english: Anger is a hurricane with the power to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒是擁有摧毀一切力量的颶風。

sentences.english: Along with these events there will take place a restructuration of your power structure.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨這些事件的發生你們的力量組織也會得到重建。

sentences.english: This is power based upon love and harmlessness.
sentences.chinese: 這是基於愛及無害的力量。
